title: Web 3.0 and Metaverse Developer: Blockchain, DAOs, DAPPs and more
desc: Learn all about web3 and metaverse the future of the web! This is a comprehensive course that teaches you the core concepts of blockchain technology, as well as how to apply them to build decentralized applications (DApps) and deploying smart contracts.

title: Artificial Intelligence Specialization: Data Science and Machine Learning
desc: Our Artificial Intelligence course is designed to teach beginner and intermediate learners how AI works and how it can be applied in the real world. We cover topics such as machine learning, deep learning, neural networks and more.

title: Cloud Native Computing Foundation: Architecture and Development
desc: The cloud native course is designed to provide an overview of the concepts, technologies and tools required to build contemporary cloud-based systems. You will learn how to build distributed systems, deploy microservices on Kubernetes and develop web apps.

title: Ambient Computing and IoT: Intelligence, Smart technologies, and more
desc: This course will cover topics such as IoT architecture, security, privacy, interoperability and more. We'll learn about cloud storage and processing, geolocation data collection as well as building more complex applications like smart home systems and other types of sensors.
